*_license_text:
SOFTWARE LICENSE AGREEMENT

----YOU, THE END USER, SHALL USE THIS SOFTWARE INCLUDING ANY FUTURE RELEASES, REVISIONS, UPDATES OR ENHANCEMENTS TO THE SOFTWARE (COLLECTIVELY, "THE SOFTWARE") ACCORDING TO THE TERMS OF THIS AGREEMENT (“THIS AGREEMENT”).
BY INSTALLING OR USING THE SOFTWARE, OR CLICKING ON THE "ACCEPT"
BUTTON, YOU ARE AGREEING TO BE BOUND BY THESE TERMS. IF YOU DO NOT ACCEPT THE TERMS OF THIS AGREEMENT, YOU MAY NOT INSTALL THIS SOFTWARE INTO ANY COMPUTER.


1. Grant of License
The Software is licensed for use by you for the equipment packaged with the Software or designated by its supplier or us ("the Equipment"). You are permitted to use the Software on any computer which permits electronic access to the Equipment. You are not permitted to rent or lease the Software or to transfer your rights under this license to a third party.

2. Duration
The license of the Software under this Agreement is effective until terminated. The license of the Software under this Agreement will terminate where you fail to comply with the terms of this Agreement. Upon termination, you agree to destroy all copies of the Software and its documentation. 

3. Ownership of Software 
You own, if any, only the magnetic media on which the Software has been delivered. It is an express condition of this Agreement that the right, title and interest in and to the Software shall be retained by us or our licensors.

4. Copying
You may not make any copies nor cause any person to make copies of the Software except such copies as are necessary for licensed use and one copy for operational security. Any such copies are subject to the conditions of this Agreement.
You may not modify, adapt, merge, translate, reverse engineer, decompile, disassemble or create derivative works based on the whole or any part of the Software or its associated documentation.
You may be held legally responsible for any copyright infringement, unauthorized transfer, reproduction or use of the Software or its documentation.

5. Future Release
You acknowledge and agree that any future releases, revisions, updates or enhancements to the software may be automatically installed in your computer.

6. Third Party Programs
You acknowledge that the Software may contain software programs, code or libraries owned by third parties and/or licensed pursuant to one or more open source software licenses (“Third Party Programs”).  Your use of such Third Party Programs is subject to additional terms and conditions which may be found in the installation text files or download media that we may provide to you in connection with the Software. Only when expressly permitted by applicable law without the possibility of contractual waiver or required by the license terms of a Third Party Program, we waive the prohibition in Section 4 against reverse engineering or decompiling, but only for the limited purpose required by the applicable license or law and not to create any software which is substantially similar to the Software.  Notwithstanding anything herein to the contrary, all Third Party Programs are furnished by us without support, “as is” and without any warranties of any kind, express or implied.

7. USER’S INFORMATION
YOU CONSENT TO THE COLLECTION AND TRANSMISSION BY THE SOFTWARE OF INFORMATION ABOUT YOUR COPIERS, PRINTERS, MULTI FUNCTIONAL DEVICES, AND YOUR COMPUTERS TO OUR REMOTE SERVER, WHICH MAY BE LOCATED OUTSIDE THE COUNTRY WHERE YOUR DEVICES ARE LOCATED. THE INFORMATION MAY INCLUDE, BY WAY OF ILLUSTRATION AND NOT LIMITATION: (I) IDENTIFICATION OF ANY NETWORKED OUTPUT DEVICE (E.G., MAKE, MODEL AND SERIAL NUMBER) AND INFORMATION IN CONNECTION WITH YOUR COMPUTER (E.G., OPERATING SYSTEM NAME AND ITS VERSION), (II) DEVICE USAGE, METER AND DIAGNOSTIC INFORMATION (E.G., NUMBER OF PAGES PRINTED, ERROR CODES, ETC.), AND (III) VERIFICATION OF LICENSE COMPLIANCE.  THIS SOFTWARE CANNOT AND DOES NOT COLLECT DOCUMENT CONTENT OR PERSONALLY IDENTIFIABLE INFORMATION ABOUT YOU. WE MAY ALSO USE THIS INFORMATION FOR ITS REGULAR BUSINESS PURPOSES INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO PRODUCT DEVELOPMENT, RESEARCH AND MARKETING, SO LONG AS THE INFORMATION IS COLLECTED ANONYMOUSLY IN A FORM THAT DOES NOT PERSONALLY IDENTIFY YOU.

8. Limitation of Warranty
The media, if any, not the Software contained therein, is warranted to the original purchaser against defects in material and workmanship for a period of one year from the date of original purchase of the Equipment. Defective media will be replaced when it is returned to your supplier, postage prepaid, along with a copy of the purchase receipt.
THESE RIGHTS ARE YOUR SOLE AND EXCLUSIVE REMEDY, WHETHER IN TORT, CONTRACT, OR OTHERWISE. IN NO EVENT SHALL WE OR SUPPLIER, OWNER OF THE SOFTWARE OR THEIR LICENSORS BE LIABLE FOR ANY DAMAGES (INCLUDING ANY FOR LOSS OF INFORMATION, PROFITS, SAVINGS OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION OR OTHER DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, CONSEQUENTIAL OR SPECIAL DAMAGES) ARISING OUT OF THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE THEREOF, OR THE INABILITY TO USE THE SOFTWARE.

9. Exporting Law
You acknowledge that the export of the Software is governed by the export control laws of the United States and other countries. You agree to comply with all such export control laws.

10. Governing Law and Jurisdiction
If any provision or portion of this Agreement shall be found to be illegal, invalid or unenforceable, the remaining provisions shall remain in full force and effect. 
The governing law and jurisdiction for this Agreement will depend upon where you purchased or obtained the Software, as follows: 
(a) if you purchased or obtained the Software in the Americas, this Agreement shall be deemed made under the laws of the State of New York, USA, excluding the choice of law and conflict of law provisions, and any claim against us may be enforced or disputed only and exclusively in the courts of the State of New York, 
(b) if you purchased or obtained the Software in Europe, the Middle East or Africa, this Agreement shall be deemed made under the laws of the England, excluding the choice of law and conflict of law provisions, and any claim against us may be enforced or disputed only and exclusively in the courts of England, or 
(c) if you purchased or obtained the Software in the regions other than those provided in clauses (a) and (b) above, this Agreement shall be deemed made under the laws of Japan, excluding the choice of law and conflict of law provisions, and any claim against us may be enforced or disputed only and exclusively in the courts of Tokyo, Japan. 

To the extent permitted by local law, the parties hereto waive any right they may have to trial by jury.
select_model_in_orchestra_for_usb_recomm: Set to [On] when selecting the driver type.
status_monitor_setting_*_message_1: Select how to display Status Monitor.
usb_connect_later_confirmation_message: Do you want to cancel the connection?
printer_setting_user_code_tooltip|pcfax_: Leave the space blank when user code is not to be used.\n\nUser code is used to count the usage of the printer function per user or group.
select_software_type_to_install_pcfax_dr:
When using a LAN-Fax Generic Driver, please select the checkbox to turn the setting on.

V4LAN Fax Driver:
V4LAN Fax Driver is an ideal driver to send a fax on Windows store applications.


Note:
A device equipped with an option is needed to use the fax function.
active_prining_job_exist: There is a job currently printing. Start setup after printing has completed.
printer_setting_default_printer_tooltip|: Will have priority when printing from the application.
setup_type_usb_label: Select when the PC and the device are directly connected by a USB cable.
invalid_parameter_ipp_port_name_message: The IPP port name is invalid.
printer_search_error_step3_description:
Check the device's IP address.

Get IP address from device's [System Setting List].
For more information, please check the User Guide.
printer_setting_setup_with_bidi_update|s: Connect &with device and set device option settings
printer_power_off_step1_description: Please unplug the USB cable from the device.
summury_install_fail_at_alternative_driv: Add device has succeeded.\nAdditional driver installation has failed.
summury_installed_latest_driver: All the installed drivers are the latest version.
summury_install_only_driver_success_by_s: Devices are automatically added by connecting a USB cable to a product after the program has finished.
printer_search_error_step1_description: Turn the device's power switch to [On].
shared_printer_port_msg: Select a network printer to add.
not_included_driver_for_32bit_system: The 64-bit Driver Installer has been executed on a 32-bit operating system.\nPlease run the installer for 32-bit.
printer_search_on_local_network_recommen: Set to [On] when changing the device name displayed on your computer or changing the shared settings.
message_hdd_error: There is no free space on the HDD.
printer_search_error_step2_description: Connect the LAN cable to the device.
printer_setting_shared_printer_name_tool: Enter the device name that will be displayed on other computers.
usb_connect_later_confirmation_details:
Cannot add device to your computer when connection is cancelled.
Are you sure you want to cancel the connection and end the setup?

After ending setup, turn the device's power switch to [On] and connect
the USB cable, the device will be added and printing will be available.
online_user_registration_*_message_of_su: Entry of [Product Name] and [Serial Number]/[Model Number] are required on registration.\nPlease have the Warranty (provisional) that comes with the product available before clicking the button.
printer_setting_printer_name_tooltip|pcf: Enter the device name to be displayed on your computer.
select_model_in_web_package_message: Please select device to use and click [Next].
confirm_update_programs_details: Update to the latest $ricoh_device_software_manager___ to use\n$ricoh_device_software_manager___.
cant_start_spooler|message_cant_start_sp: Cannot start the print spooler service. Start setup after starting the print spooler service.
summury_not_found_driver: The specified driver cannot be found.
update_programs_details:
To use $driver_installer_______, updating to the latest
version is required.
After updating $ricoh_device_software_manager___,
restart $driver_installer_______ and continue the setup.
Do you want to perform the update?
not_supported_os_for_exp: The software supported by your OS cannot be found.
select_model_in_orchestra_for_usb_model_: Connect the printer and the PC with a USB cable. Or, enter the device name (a numeric value).\nSelect the device you are using from the search results. Click [Next] after the selection is made.
device_property_message: Please set [Accessories] in the following steps.
status_monitor_setting_*_monitor_by_one_: &Monitor printers using same port by one monitor
printer_search_on_local_network_message: Select the device to use from the list and click [Next].\nClick [Click if you cannot find the device] when specifying the device's IP address.
printer_power_off_message: Please perform the following steps before installing the driver.
printer_power_on_message: Please connect with the device following the steps below.
report_reboot_timing_label: You must restart your computer to complete the setup. \nDo you want to restart your computer as soon as the program has finished?
printer_setting_install_alternate_driver: When using your computer as the print server, usage from other computers with an OS that uses a different number of bits will be available.
status_monitor_setting_display_setting_t:
Start monitoring when printing starts:
Status Monitor is automatically displayed when printing starts. When printing finishes, it closes automatically.

Always monitor:
If you select this and then start printing or click [Display Status Monitor] on the [Maintenance] tab to start Status Monitor, the icon appears on the task tray and Status Monitor monitors continuously.

Never display Status Monitor:
Click to not start Status Monitor automatically when printing.
printer_setting_comment_tooltip|pcfax_se: Change this when you want to set a comment to the device you are using.
select_update_printer_driver_message: Select [Update] or [Do not Update] for the printers on the following list, and then click [Next].
invalid_parameter_already_used_printer_i: This is already used as a printer name or a shared name.
printer_search_on_local_network_other_me: Clic&k if you cannot find the device
printer_setting_share_tooltip|pcfax_sett: Set to [On] when using your computer as the print server from other computers.
setup_type_network_label: Make a selection when the PC and the device are connected by the network.
select_model_in_web_package_for_usb_mess: Connect the printer and the PC with a USB cable. Or, select a device name.\nClick [Next] after the selection is made.
setup_type_message: Please select a device interface and then click [Next].\nIf you want to update the driver on your computer, click [Update Driver].
license_agreement_message: To continue with installation, you must accept the terms of the End User License Agreement.\nIf you accept the terms, click [Agree] to continue the installation.
status_monitor_setting_refresh_interval_: Enter the information update interval time in the range of 1 to 99 seconds.
printer_setting_port_tooltip|pcfax_setti: Set the IP address of the device to use.
online_user_registration_*_message:
Online user registration is available by clicking [Online User Registration].
By performing the online user registration, the official warranty will be issued and free warranty service available.
We recommend you to take this opportunity to register now.
Note that clicking the below button will automatically connect you to the Internet.
status_monitor_setting_*_message_2: This enables you to check printing progress, error display, etc. \nYou can also cancel printing and view the detailed user guide.
select_model_in_orchestra_model_search_d: Please enter the device name (numeric value). Search can be performed even with only part of the device name.\nPlease select from the search results the device you are using. Click [Next] after the selection is made.
add_ipp_port_port_authentication_tooltip: Check the box if IPP authentication is required.
select_software_type_to_install_message: Select the device driver to install.
automatic_recognition_error_details:
Check that the device's power switch is on and the USB cable
is connected.
If the device is not recognized, disconnect the cable, 
click [Retry] and reconnect it.
test_page_print_success_message: Test page has been printed successfully.
message_double_launch_notify_driver_upda: Currently checking for driver updates. Please try again later.
not_included_driver_for_64bit_system: The 32-bit Driver Installer has been executed on a 64-bit operating system.\nPlease run the installer for 64-bit.
setup_type_update_label: Updates the driver that is installed on your computer.
not_supported_os_for_dom:
The software supported by your OS cannot be found.
Please download the software supported by your OS on your browser from the following URL.
https://www.ricoh.co.jp/download/

$ricoh_device_software_manager___ has finished providing the software for your OS.
Please refer to the following URL about the OS support period for RICOH products.
https://www.ricoh.co.jp/support/os/info/supportend_info.html
status_monitor_setting_monitor_by_one_mo: Monitor printers sharing the same port using one monitor.\n\nThe "Progress" indicator appears dimmed and the [Stop Printing] button is not available.
model_selection_method_message: Please select a search method and click [Next].
printer_setting_setup_with_bidi_update_t: When connected correctly with the device, the device's options, the set paper size/orientation, will be automatically set on installation.
failed_to_start_driver_web_installer_det: Please run the driver_web_installer.exe\nin the driver_web_installer directory of the driver package.
custom_driver_installed: Cannot install the selected driver because a non-updatable customized driver is installed.
device_property_message_2:
1. Click the [Open Printer Properties] button.


2. The [Accessories] screen on the printer driver is opened.


3. Set the device options on [Options].


4. If you are using [Adobe Post Script Option],
set [Adobe Postscript] in [Postscript].


5. Click [OK] button on the printer driver after the settings are
finished, and the [Accessories] screen will be closed.


6. Click the [Next] button.
add_ipp_port_port_name_tooltip|add_ipp_p:
The IPP port name format must be in
[http://] or [https://] + device IP address or the printer name + [/ipp] or [/printer].
ex) http://<IP address of the device>/ipp
http://<printer name>/printer
summury_other_usb_icon_already_installed: Since the printer is already created by other drivers, please delete the printer and try again.
message_admin_error: Administrative rights are required to operate this application.
select_software_type_to_install_pcfax_dr:
When using a LAN-Fax Generic Driver, please select the checkbox to turn the setting on.


Note:
A device equipped with an option is needed to use the fax function.
select_software_type_to_install_driver_p:
There is no need to make any changes unless a specific type of driver is to be used.

Note:
Depending on the driver type, it may be necessary to install certain options on the device.
summury_update_fail_partialy: Some driver updates failed.\nThe update process was interrupted.
select_to_install_orchestra_message:
Easily install and update the latest drivers for your Ricoh Multifunction Products (MFP) and
Printers. The $ricoh_device_software_manager___ automatically detects the applicable MFPs
and Printers on your network or connected to your PC via USB.


$ricoh_device_software_manager___ will be installed after Driver Installer has finished.
The files in the driver package are used for installation.
Please do not delete the files in the driver package.
summury_install_only_driver_success_by_e: An error occurred on adding a device.\nPlease connect the USB cable to the printer again later.
not_support_driver_for_this_system: This driver is not  supported by the current operating system.\nPlease install another driver.
software_query_searching_installable_dri: Searching for installable driver. Please wait...
software_query_confirming_pc_environment: Confirming the PC environment. Please wait...
error_unknown_ipp_port: An unknown port has been specified.
message_orchestra_installer_running_erro: $device_software_manager_setup___________ is currently running.\nPlease close $device_software_manager_setup___________ now, then try again.
invalid_parameter_ipp_port_name_details:
The IPP port name is incorrect.
Check the IPP port name and enter it again.
The IPP port name format must be in
[http://] or [https://] + device IP address or
the printer name + [/ipp] or [/printer].
proxy_authentication_first_message: The proxy server is $proxysever.\nPlease enter the user name and password.
printer_search_with_ip_address_message_o: Please enter the device's IP address and click [Search].\nFor how to check the device's IP address, please refer to the User Guide.
add_port_message: Choose a port type to add.
service_unavailable: The server is currently unavailable due to maintenance.
proxy_authentication_second_message: Proxy authentication has failed.\nEnter the correct user name and password.
printer_power_on_attention: Note:\nIt may take some time for the device to detect the connected USB cable.\nIf the installation screen of the OS is displayed, please close it and click [Cancel Connection] and re-install.
printer_search_error_message: Cannot find a device connected to the network. Please check the following.
printer_power_on_step1_description: Please plug in the USB cable to the device.
test_page_print_icon_not_exist_details: If the Installed Device is not found,\nplease reinstall the driver.
cancel_message: Are you sure you want to cancel the setup?
network_error_details:
Cannot connect with the server.
The following is considered as the cause.
- The server is currently unavailable due to maintenance
- PC is not correctly connected to the network
- Proxy settings is incorrect
select_software_type_to_install_driver_p:
There is no need to make any changes unless a specific type of driver is to be used.

V4PrinterDriver:
 V4PrinterDriver is an ideal printer driver to print on Windows store applications.


Note:
Depending on the driver type, it may be necessary to install certain options on the device.
